author: Rachel Kaser
title: Apple and Google team up to build a coronavirus tracking system
description: Apple and Google today announced they were partnering up on a contact tracing system that works on both iOS and Android that alerts people when they’ve had contact with someone who’s contracted coronavirus. This collaboration between the two big smartphone co…
